programs.title: MBA Entrance Test Preparation
programs.description: Comprehensive coaching for all major MBA entrance exams, focusing on fundamental concepts and advanced strategies.

programs.title: Exclusive Mentoring for CAT, XAT, NMAT, SNAP etc.
programs.description: Personalized one-on-one and small-group mentoring sessions tailored to individual student needs and target exams.

faculties.name: Sabyasachi Sarkar
faculties.designation: Highly Experienced Faculty in Test Prep Industry

institutions.name: Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad (IIMA)
institutions.description: One of India's premier management institutes, renowned for its academic rigor and research.

institutions.name: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIMB)
institutions.description: Known for its vibrant campus and strong emphasis on entrepreneurship and innovation.

institutions.name: Indian Institute of Management Calcutta (IIMC)
institutions.description: The first IIM to be established, famous for its finance and consulting programs.

institutions.name: XLRI - Xavier School of Management
institutions.description: A top-ranked private business school with a strong focus on ethics and human resource management.

institutions.name: Symbiosis Institute of Business Management (SIBM Pune)
institutions.description: Part of Symbiosis International University, offering diverse MBA programs and known for its vibrant student life.

institutions.name: Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies (NMIMS)
institutions.description: A leading private university offering a wide range of management and other professional programs.

tests.name: CAT (Common Admission Test)
tests.qualification: Bachelor's degree with minimum 50% aggregate marks (45% for SC/ST/PwD candidates).

tests.name: XAT (Xavier Aptitude Test)
tests.qualification: Bachelor's degree of minimum three years duration or equivalent.

tests.name: NMAT by GMAC
tests.time: Testing window from October to December
tests.qualification: Bachelor's degree (10+2+3 or 10+2+4) with 50% aggregate marks.

tests.name: SNAP (Symbiosis National Aptitude Test)
tests.qualification: Graduate with minimum 50% marks (45% for SC/ST categories).
